options.text: This solution installs the data connector for Digital Shadows SearchLight to import Digital Shadows SearchLight alerts as custom log data into your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. Configure and enable this data connector in the Data Connector gallery after this solution deploys. This data connector creates the custom log table 'DigitalShadows_CL' in the targeted Azure Log Analytics workspace.

link.label: Learn more about connecting data sources

options.text: This Microsoft Sentinel solution installs workbooks. Workbooks provide a flexible canvas for data monitoring, analysis and the creation of rich visual reports within the Azure portal. They allow you to tap into one or many data sources from Microsoft Sentinel and combine them into unified interactive experiences.
A workbook that provides a dashboard to gain insights into Digital Shadows alerts.

This Microsoft Sentinel solution installs analytic rules for Digital Shadows SearchLight that you can enable for custom alert generation in Microsoft Sentinel. These analytic rules will be deployed in disabled mode in the Analytic Rules gallery of your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. Configure and enable these rules in the Analytic Rules gallery after this solution deploys.

This solution installs the Playbook templates to help implement your Security Orchestration, Automation and Response (SOAR) operations. After installing the solution, these will be deployed under Playbook Templates in the Automation blade in Microsoft Sentinel. They can be configured and managed from the Manage solution view in Content Hub.

This playbook triggers when a new alert is generated. The playbook updates the status of the Microsoft Sentinel Incident. This makes sure that the status of Microsoft Sentinel is synchronized with the associated Digital Shadows SearchLight alert.
